crawlingcoast.name: Crawling Coast
crawlingcoast.flavor: Exhibits high quantities of hydrogen and oxygen. Anomalous biosignatures detected.
crawlingcoast.description: Stepping through the portal, you squint your eyes, blinded for a moment by sun-on-sand. The wind is cold and humid. A wave crashes against the blackened rocks and you are blanketed for a moment by sea spray. You look to the horizon, to landforms that melt and twist slowly and deliberately like a distant storm. Even the ground beneath your feet moves, so slowly that you could scarcely notice it. Two dim suns glare down through sea mist. You have a slow certainty that you are being observed.

conditions.name: Rising Tides
conditions.description: At 10 disruption, the tide is waist deep: AGI tests have [-], STR tests to lift or carry have [+].

conditions.name: Sensitive Ecosphere
conditions.description: Adding a new substance, or leaving an item in the ecosphere adds +1 disruption.

encounters.description: A *creatures.roamingmicrobiome* and a *creatures.sableoilblob* fighting each other in an oozy battle for territorial supremacy.
A dying *creatures.krakenautofac* beached on the shore, bleeding out 1d3 *creatures.sableoilblob*s.

A terrible rending and rumbling from below. The water runs dark with oil. A smell of burning plastic and vaporized heavy metals runs on the breeze. A *creatures.krakenautofac* breaches the surface, searching for threats.

events: Waves lap peacefully at the rocky shore.
Two suns peek through the clouds briefly, reflected on the water's surface.
Come across a trench between tide pools. Takes 1 turn to cross.
Drop an item into the water.
Discover fruiting kelp grove pool. +1d3 supplies.
A glimmer in the distance: +1 knowledge.
Traces of black oil cast rainbow sheens on the water's surface. +1 disruption.
Discover partially devoured herbivore corpse. +1d3 supplies, +1 disruption.
Sight something massive in the distance, moving under the water's surface. +1 knowledge.
